clause.title: Description Container for UnitsML units, quantities, and prefixes.
Description Container for units. Use in UnitsML container or directly incorporate into a host schema.
Description Element for describing units. Use in containers UnitSet or directly incorporate into a host schema.
Description Container for describing the system of units.
Description Element containing the unit name.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <UnitSymbol xml:lang="" [0..1] type="union of: [ xsd:token, [ xsd:token (value comes from list: {'ASCII'|'Unicode'|'LaTeX'|'HTML'|'MathML'|'SVG'}) ] ]" [1] />

clause.title: Description Element for descriptive information, including version changes to the unit.
Description Element for listing the unit code value from a specific code list.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <CodeListValue unitCodeValue="xsd:string" [1] codeListName="xsd:normalizedString" [0..1] codeListVersion="xsd:token" [0..1] locationURL="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] organizationName="xsd:normalizedString" [0..1] organizationURI="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] xml:lang="" [0..1] />

clause.title: Description Container for defining derived units in terms of their root units. This allows a precise definition of a wide range of units. The goal is to improve interoperability among applications and databases which use derived units based on commonly encountered root units.
Description Element for a root unit (from an extensive enumerated list) allowing an optional prefix and power. E.g., mm^2

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <EnumeratedRootUnit unit="xsd:token (value comes from list: {'meter'|'gram'|'second'|'ampere'|'kelvin'|'mole'|'candela'|'radian'|'steradian'|'hertz'|'newton'|'pascal'|'joule'|'watt'|'coulomb'|'volt'|'farad'|'ohm'|'siemens'|'weber'|'tesla'|'henry'|'degree_Celsius'|'lumen'|'lux'|'katal'|'becquerel'|'gray'|'sievert'|'minute'|'hour'|'day'|'arc_degree'|'arc_minute'|'arc_second'|'liter'|'metric_ton'|'electronvolt'|'unified_atomic_mass_unit'|'astronomical_unit'|'atomic_unit_of_1st_hyperpolarizability'|'atomic_unit_of_2nd_hyperpolarizability'|'atomic_unit_of_action'|'atomic_unit_of_charge'|'atomic_unit_of_charge_density'|'atomic_unit_of_current'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_dipole_moment'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_field'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_field_gradient'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_polarizability'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_potential'|'atomic_unit_of_electric_quadrupole_moment'|'atomic_unit_of_energy'|'atomic_unit_of_force'|'atomic_unit_of_length'|'atomic_unit_of_magnetic_dipole_moment'|'atomic_unit_of_magnetic_flux_density'|'atomic_unit_of_magnetizability'|'atomic_unit_of_mass'|'atomic_unit_of_momentum'|'atomic_unit_of_permittivity'|'atomic_unit_of_time'|'atomic_unit_of_velocity'|'natural_unit_of_action'|'natural_unit_of_action_in_eV_s'|'natural_unit_of_energy'|'natural_unit_of_energy_in_MeV'|'natural_unit_of_length'|'natural_unit_of_mass'|'natural_unit_of_momentum'|'natural_unit_of_momentum_in_MeV_per_c'|'natural_unit_of_time'|'natural_unit_of_velocity'|'nautical_mile'|'knot'|'angstrom'|'are'|'hectare'|'barn'|'bar'|'gal'|'curie'|'roentgen'|'rad'|'rem'|'erg'|'dyne'|'barye'|'poise'|'rhe'|'stokes'|'darcy'|'kayser'|'lambert'|'phot'|'thermo_calorie'|'table_calorie'|'debye'|'abampere'|'abcoulomb'|'abfarad'|'abhenry'|'abohm'|'abmho'|'abvolt'|'abwatt'|'maxwell'|'gauss'|'gilbert'|'oersted'|'stilb'|'statampere'|'statcoulomb'|'statfarad'|'stathenry'|'statohm'|'statmho'|'statvolt'|'statwatt'|'statweber'|'stattesla'|'long_ton'|'short_ton'|'gross_hundredweight'|'hundredweight'|'av_pound'|'av_ounce'|'av_dram'|'troy_pound'|'troy_ounce'|'pennyweight' clause.title: Description Element for those special cases where the root unit needed is not included in the enumerated list in the above element.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <ExternalRootUnit unit="xsd:anyURI" [1] annotation="xsd:string" [0..1] xml:lang="" [0..1] sourceURL="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] prefix="xsd:token (value comes from list: {'Y'|'Z'|'E'|'P'|'T'|'G'|'M'|'k'|'h'|'da'|'d'|'c'|'m'|'u'|'n'|'p'|'f'|'a'|'z'|'y'|'Ki'|'Mi'|'Gi'|'Ti'|'Pi'|'Ei'|'Zi'|'Yi'})" [0..1] powerNumerator="xsd:byte" [0..1] powerDenominator="xsd:byte" [0..1] />

clause.title: Description Container for providing conversion information to other units.
Description Element for providing factors for a conversion equation from another unit; y = d + ((b / c) (x + a))

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <Float64ConversionFrom xml:id="" [1] initialAddend="xsd:double" [0..1] initialAddendDecimalPlace="xsd:byte" [0..1] multiplicand="xsd:double" [0..1] multiplicandDigits="xsd:unsignedByte" [0..1] divisor="xsd:double" [0..1] divisorDigits="xsd:unsignedByte" [0..1] finalAddend="xsd:double" [0..1] finalAddendDecimalPlace="xsd:byte" [0..1] exact="xsd:boolean" [0..1] initialUnit="xsd:anyURI" [1] > <ConversionNote> ... </ConversionNote> [0..*] </Float64ConversionFrom>

clause.title: Description Element for providing unit conversion information for conversions that are more complex than the Float64ConversionFrom linear equation.
Description Element for providing conversion based on SOAP/WSDL calls to a remote server.
Description Element to describe the WSDL service.
Description Element for a description of the SpecialConversionFrom.
Description Element for all quantities that can be expressed using this unit.
Description Element to describe the definition of the unit.
Description Element to describe the historical development of the unit.
Description Element as a placeholder for additional information.
Description Container for items that are counted and are (in practice) combined with scientific units of measure.
Description Container for a single counted item.
Description Element containing the item name(s).
Description Element containing symbols for the item.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <ItemSymbol xml:lang="" [0..1] type="union of: [ xsd:token, [ xsd:token (value comes from list: {'ASCII'|'Unicode'|'LaTeX'|'HTML'|'MathML'|'SVG'}) ] ]" [1] />

clause.title: Description Element for descriptive information, including version changes to the item.
Description Element to describe the definition of the item.
Description Element to describe the historical development of the item.
Description Element as a placeholder for additional information.
Description Element for describing quantities and referencing corresponding units. Use in container or directly incorporate into a host schema.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <Quantity xml:id="" [1] quantityType="xsd:token (value comes from list: {'base'|'derived'})" [0..1] dimensionURL="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] > <QuantityName> ... </QuantityName> [1..*] <QuantitySymbol> ... </QuantitySymbol> [0..*] <UnitReference> ... </UnitReference> [0..*] <QuantityVersionHistory> ... </QuantityVersionHistory> [0..*] <QuantityDefinition> ... </QuantityDefinition> [0..*] <QuantityHistory> ... </QuantityHistory> [0..*] <QuantityRemark> ... </QuantityRemark> [0..*] </Quantity>

clause.title: Description Element containing the quantity name.
Description Element containing various quantity symbols.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <QuantitySymbol xml:lang="" [0..1] type="union of: [ xsd:token, [ xsd:token (value comes from list: {'ASCII'|'Unicode'|'LaTeX'|'HTML'|'MathML'|'SVG'}) ] ]" [1] />

clause.title: Description Element for referencing a unit of measure from within the Quantity element.
Description Element for descriptive information, including version changes to the unit.
Description Element to describe the definition of the quantity.
Description Element to describe the historical development of the quantity.
Description Element as a placeholder for additional information.

Description Element to express the dimension of a unit or quantity in terms of the SI base quantities length, mass, time, electric current, thermodynamic temperature, amount of substance, and luminous intensity.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity length.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity mass.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity time.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity electric current.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity thermodynamic temerature.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity amount of substance.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity luminous intensity.
Description Element containing the dimension of the quantity plane angle.

Description Element containing the dimension of any item. Note: this element is meant to be used to allow counted items to be included in the dimensioning of a derived quantity, e.g., electrons per time; usage of this element does not conform to the SI description of the dimension of a quantity in terms of seven base quantities.
Description Element containing information about a prefix.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <Prefix xml:id="" [1] prefixBase="xsd:byte (value comes from list: {'10'|'2'})" [0..1] prefixPower="xsd:byte" [0..1] > <PrefixName> ... </PrefixName> [1..*] <PrefixSymbol> ... </PrefixSymbol> [0..*] </Prefix>

clause.title: Description Element containing the prefix name.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <PrefixSymbol xml:lang="" [0..1] type="union of: [ xsd:token, [ xsd:token (value comes from list: {'ASCII'|'Unicode'|'LaTeX'|'HTML'|'MathML'|'SVG'}) ] ]" [1] />

clause.title:
Used By
UnitsML
clause.p: Description ComplexType for the root element of an UnitsML document.

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="UnitsMLType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="UnitSet" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="CountedItemSet" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="QuantitySet" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="DimensionSet" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="PrefixSet" minOccurs="0""/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
UnitSet
clause.p: Description Type for the unit container.

clause.title:
Used By
Unit
clause.p: Description Type for the unit.

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="UnitType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="UnitSystem" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitName" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitSymbol" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="CodeListValue" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="RootUnits" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="Conversions" minOccurs="0""/> <xsd:element ref="QuantityReference" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitVersionHistory" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitDefinition" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitHistory" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="UnitRemark" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute ref="xml:id" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="timeStamp" type="xsd:dateTime" use="optional"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="dimensionURL"/> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
CodeListValue
clause.p: Description Type for the element for listing the unit code value from a specific code list.

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <... unitCodeValue="xsd:string" [1] codeListName="xsd:normalizedString" [0..1] codeListVersion="xsd:token" [0..1] locationURL="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] organizationName="xsd:normalizedString" [0..1] organizationURI="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] xml:lang="" [0..1] />

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="CodeListValueType"> <xsd:attribute name="unitCodeValue" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="codeListName" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="codeListVersion" type="xsd:token" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="locationURL" type="xsd:anyURI" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="organizationName" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="organizationURI" type="xsd:anyURI" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute ref="xml:lang" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
RootUnits
clause.p: Description Type for the container for defining derived units in terms of their root units. This allows a precise definition of a wide range of units. The goal is to improve interoperability among applications and databases which use derived units based on commonly encountered base units.

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="RootUnitsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="EnumeratedRootUnit" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> <xsd:element ref="ExternalRootUnit" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
EnumeratedRootUnit
clause.p: Description Type for the element for a root unit (from an extensive enumerated list) allowing an optional prefix and power. E.g., mm^2

sourcecode.name: XML Instance Representation
sourcecode.body: <... unit="xsd:anyURI" [1] annotation="xsd:string" [0..1] xml:lang="" [0..1] sourceURL="xsd:anyURI" [0..1] prefix="xsd:token (value comes from list: {'Y'|'Z'|'E'|'P'|'T'|'G'|'M'|'k'|'h'|'da'|'d'|'c'|'m'|'u'|'n'|'p'|'f'|'a'|'z'|'y'|'Ki'|'Mi'|'Gi'|'Ti'|'Pi'|'Ei'|'Zi'|'Yi'})" [0..1] powerNumerator="xsd:byte" [0..1] powerDenominator="xsd:byte" [0..1] />

sourcecode.body: <... xml:id="" [1] initialAddend="xsd:double" [0..1] initialAddendDecimalPlace="xsd:byte" [0..1] multiplicand="xsd:double" [0..1] multiplicandDigits="xsd:unsignedByte" [0..1] divisor="xsd:double" [0..1] divisorDigits="xsd:unsignedByte" [0..1] finalAddend="xsd:double" [0..1] finalAddendDecimalPlace="xsd:byte" [0..1] exact="xsd:boolean" [0..1] initialUnit="xsd:anyURI" [1] > <ConversionNote> ... </ConversionNote> [0..*] </...>

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="Float64ConversionFromType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ConversionNote" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute ref="xml:id" use="required"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="initialUnit"/> <xsd:attribute name="initialAddend" type="xsd:double" use="optional" default="0"/> <xsd:attribute name="initialAddendDecimalPlace" type="xsd:byte" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="multiplicand" type="xsd:double" use="optional" default="1"/> <xsd:attribute name="multiplicandDigits" type="xsd:unsignedByte" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="divisor" type="xsd:double" use="optional" default="1"/> <xsd:attribute name="divisorDigits" type="xsd:unsignedByte" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="finalAddend" type="xsd:double" use="optional" default="0"/> <xsd:attribute name="finalAddendDecimalPlace" type="xsd:byte" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="exact" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
SpecialConversionFrom
clause.p: Description Type for the element for providing unit conversion information for conversions that are more complex than the Float64ConversionFrom linear equation.

sourcecode.body: <xsd:complexType name="SpecialConversionFromType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ConversionDescription" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded""/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute ref="xml:id" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="conversionURL" type="xsd:anyURI" use="optional"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="initialUnit"/> </xsd:complexType>

clause.title:
Used By
WSDLConversionFrom
clause.p: Description Type for the element for providing unit conversion information for conversions that are more complex than the Float64ConversionFrom linear equation.

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation

Description An exponent of the unit, specified as powerNumerator and powerDenominator.

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:attributeGroup name="powerRational"> <xsd:attribute name="powerNumerator" type="xsd:byte" use="optional" default="1"/> <xsd:attribute name="powerDenominator" type="xsd:byte" use="optional" default="1"/> </xsd:attributeGroup>

clause.title: Description Prefix identifier; e.g., m, k, M, G. [Enumeration order is by prefix magnitude (Y to y) followed by binary prefixes.]

sourcecode.name: Schema Component Representation
sourcecode.body: <xsd:attributeGroup name="prefix"> <xsd:attribute name="prefix" use="optional">Liquid error: No documents in template path: /Users/apple/ruby_gems/metanorma-plugin-lutaml/xsd_templates/simple_type </xsd:attribute> </xsd:attributeGroup>

clause.title: Description URL to a representation of the unit or quantity in terms of the 7 SI base dimensions.
